B?.text:
Backdrops Tutorial

Any of these backdrops can be changed. The down arrow on your keyboard will activate the stop light protocol which changed the color effect to a still color shade.

B@.text:
Welcome to the Hitfel 3 Edit Mode tutorial.

Look for notes or comments like this in all the sprites and backdrops for help.

Hitfel 3 is a trademark of ProID Corporation. All rights reserved.

HITFEL 3 SYSTEM SPRITE TUTORIAL

This is a shell sprite. This sprite controls system broadcasts, audio, and menus.

Do not edit this sprite unless you need to redirect to another backdrop. The rest should be left alone.

Opening app....

r1.text:
By default, the current application that is loaded into the system is the motion tracking demo. To change the game, remove the "if motiontrackcomplete = true" and all other blocks after that to remove access to the motion tracking demo.

If you have a game that requires motion tracking, see the next note.

Please remember for performance reasons, by default only one game can be loaded at a time especially if it comes with audio or lots of blocks.

B{.text: Remove all blocks after this one to insert your game with motion tracking.

B}.text:
DISC SYSTEM SPRITE TUTORIAL

This sprite controls the redirect to an app that is currently loaded into the system. We like to call these discs or a disk.

This is not a shell sprite and you can change it to your needs. It is recommended to change the title of the game, and a way to switch from the main menu to your game. You can add an image instead of a title but for quality reasons we recommend just a title.

Cb.text:
POWER SPRITE TUTORIAL

This is a shell sprite. This sprite is used to turn off the console and disable all scripts until the green flag is pressed again.

Nothing here should be changed unless you're making a custom way to turn off the console.

Cc.text: This sprite can be changed. Click the "costumes" menu and change the thumbnail to however you want. Go to the "Looks" blocks section and click show. Then save your project. Only do this once you are finished adding.

MESSAGE: Welcome to Maintenance Mode!
This allows you to disable and enable certain features. This also allows you to uninstall the system for the current session. All changes will be reverted once the green flag is pressed.

QUESTION: Would you like to uninstall the system?

MESSAGE: Preparing to uninstall system.
Deleting game data.
50% of uninstall finished.
Deleting motion tracking data
Hitfel 3 has successfully uninstalled. Turning off console.
The system is unable to be uninstalled. All data installed before has been recovered. Press the green flag.
Data wipe failed. No installation utility found. Press the green flag.
Data wipe aborted. Restarting console.

Cd.text:
MAINTENANCE MODE SPRITE TUTORIAL

WARNING: EDITING THIS SPRITE COULD BREAK THE CONSOLE.

This is a shell sprite. Only press "9" when your at the welcome screen. 

This sprite controls the uninstall process. It does not actually uninstall anything but it simulates the uninstall and data wipe process for the Hitfel 3.

If you remove or deactivate anything in this sprite you are at risk of breaking the console.

Please only edit this sprite if you know what you're doing.

MESSAGE: Welcome to the Motion Tracking Setup!
Please go to the Volume Licensing Center project to get your tracking code.

QUESTION: Please enter the code now.

MESSAGE: Please allow adequate space in your area to avoid tracking errors. Make sure nothing is can be seen in the center area of the camera.
Hitfel 3 requires access to your camera to proceed with the process. Press the "Allow" button in your browser now.
With enough space, try to touch the thin red circle in the middle with your palm or finger.

QUESTION: Did you hear a click? (Y/N)

MESSAGE: Tracking process is completed. Your Hitfel 3 system is ready for motion tracking. Make sure to use this setup before using a motion enabled application.
Your Hitfel 3 was unable to setup body tracking for your system. Make sure you are on a PC with a clear working webcam. To try again, press the red ring.
Motion Setup aborted. The code was invalid. Check your spelling.
Motion tracking has already been setup on this system. Press the green flag and come back to the Other menu to recalibrate.
You are connected to the Hitfel Network!
You are not connected to the network.
WARNING! Uninstalling the system will remove and delete all data on the system.

QUESTION: Are you sure you'd like to uninstall the system?
Please confirm by typing in your username.

MESSAGE: Now uninstalling system.
Uninstalling music.
Uninstalling backups.
The Hitfel 3 has been uninstalled and all data has been wiped. Please press the green flag to reinstall.
ABORTED.
ABORTED.
I was unable to detect what you we're trying to say. Please try again.

Ce.text:
ASSISTRING SPRITE TUTORIAL

This is a shell sprite. The main and default purpose of this sprite is to calibrate and test motion tracking on your device. Motion tracking is only available for PC devices or very powerful mobile devices.

You should only need to change things in this sprite if you're adding more settings to change.

MESSAGE: Welcome to the Hitfel 3!
In just a few moments, you are about to install greatness!
Before we start, lets make sure your system can run Hitfel 3.
Hold shift + green flag to enable Turbo mode.

QUESTION: Are the background colors changing fast?

MESSAGE: Your system is ready to install! Please disable turbo mode by pressing the green flag + shift again.
If the colors aren't changing rapidly, your device may not be able to fully support Hitfel 3 and its features. For better performance, leave the setup now and go to the Hitfel 3 Legacy Edition.

QUESTION: Are you ready to install?

MESSAGE: INSTALLING SYSTEM...(DO NOT PRESS GREEN FLAG OR RED STOP SIGN)

Installing backups..
Your Hitfel 3 has successfully installed!
When you're ready to boot up, press the green flag.
Shutting down...
INSTALL ABORTED.

MESSAGE: Welcome to Masterman Chronicles!
This game is completed with words.
It's not an RPG or a platformer.
The ultimate goal is to make the MM on the screen become HUGE. Then you will become the MASTERMAN.
Creating save data... DON'T PRESS THE GREEN FLAG or THE HOME BUTTON.
When I say "Saving..." the game will autosave. Don't press the green flag or home button otherwise the data may become corrupted.
In order to win this game, your MM must be at 100%.
You will be given a riddle. Solving the riddle will grow your MM.
However, if you get the riddle wrong... You'll have to restart the game!
Good luck!!
Saving...
Let's begin with a simple riddle...

QUESTION: What's black, start's with M and ends with M on this screen?

MESSAGE: Correct! Let's bump your master up!
Saving...
Next riddle...

QUESTION: What's rectangular and can play movies, video games, cable? (HINT: It's in a lot of houses.)

MESSAGE: Correct! Your master just got a little bigger!
Saving...
Next riddle...

QUESTION: What's the name of the most followed Scratcher? (HINT: What rhymes with Driffpatch?)

MESSAGE: Correct!  Your master is growing fast!
Saving...
Next riddle...

QUESTION: What's blocky and is a computer video game? (Hint: Mine_____?)

MESSAGE: Correct! Your master is getting there!
Saving...
Next riddle...

QUESTION: What's orange and a cat? (Hint: He's the mascot of Scratch!)

MESSAGE: Correct! Oh look! Scratch Cat came and joined the party!
Saving...
Next riddle...

QUESTION: What's red and a fruit? (Hint: Very common fruit.)

MESSAGE: Correct! Your master is almost there!
Saving...
Next riddle...

QUESTION: Who created Super Bass?

MESSAGE: Congrats! You sucessfully raised your Master!
The game save data has been reseted. Reopen to play again.
Uh oh! That's incorrect!
GAME OVER!
Reopen the game to try again.
Uh oh! That's incorrect!
GAME OVER!
Reopen the game to try again.
Uh oh! That's incorrect!
GAME OVER!
Reopen the game to try again.
Uh oh! That's incorrect!
GAME OVER!

GAME OVER!
Reopen the game to try again.

GAME OVER!

Uh oh! That's incorrect!
GAME OVER!

This app could not be found. So we'll delete the icon off your home menu.

Welcome to Hitfel Party!
Hitfel Party is a game to play with your friends and family so grab them and pick a game!
Click on a game or press the home button.
This game is simple! Be as loud as humanly possible! Get everyone in the room!
The game starts on three!
Begin!
SCREAM, YELL, AND SHOUT! Get the highest score!
Game over!
Your score was...
Bo
Hello!
Congrats!
The game has ended. Pick another game or exit with the home button.

QUESTION: Would you like to play by yourself or with a friend? (Myself/Friend)

MESSAGE: This game is simple. You need two players to play this game.
The objective is to have the highest score by pressing on your selected arrow key.
You have ten seconds to decide who will be Player 1(Left Arrow) and Player 2(Right Arrow).
The game starts on three!
Begin!
Press your arrow keys as much as you can!
This game is simple. You will be playing against the Computer.
The objective is to have the highest score by pressing on your left key and try and beat Player 2.
The game starts on three!
Begin!
Press your arrow keys as much as you can!
Congratulations! Check if you won!
Congratulations! Which one of you won!
Rock, Paper, Scissors is a simple game! Just type in Rock, Paper, or Scissors.
The game starts on 3!
Begin!

QUESTION: Rock, Paper, or Scissors? (R/P/S)

MESSAGE: The AI wins!
You win!
The AI wins!
You win!
The AI wins!
You win!
